```{r}
power.cells <- read.csv("power cells.csv")
Y<-power.cells$Y
X1<-power.cells$X1
X2<-power.cells$X2
X1c<-(X1-mean(X1))/0.4
X2c<-(X2-mean(X2))/10
X1c2<-X1c^2
X2c2<-X2c^2
X1X2c<-X1c*X2c
f2<-lm(Y~X1c+X2c+X1c2+X2c2+X1X2c)
summary(f2)
anova(f2)
library(alr3)
pureErrorAnova(f2)
f2R<-lm(Y~X1c+X2c)
summary(f2R)
anova(f2R,f2)
```
